title: A Visit to Ireland
creator_credit: David A. Smart and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: The film shows various aspects of life in Southern Ireland. Covers the following: typical farm activities, harvesting grain, thatching with straw, peat cutting; scenes of Blarney Castle and of the Blarney Stone; life in Dublin; carding, spinning and weaving in the home; the churches of Ireland; recreational activities.
